entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers over southern sections this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
